recipes.label: Rats on the Beams
recipes.startdescription: Any ship has the odd pest, but the infestation on the kite has grown out of proportion. We need to manage it, and now. [Approach this challenge with Moth or Knock.]

recipes.label: Extermination
recipes.startdescription: With venom, with traps, with tricks and with ingenuity, we make the tight spaces inhospitable to them. We quell their numbers until they can no longer act so bold.

recipes.label: Tide of Vermin
recipes.startdescription: We cannot stem the tide, and some of our cargo is lost to the onslaught.
